ai-tha-ap510:1.1_0: “A Buddha praised the appearance of a golden palanquin,
ai-tha-ap510:1.4_0: the gift of those who camel’s fruit.
ai-tha-ap510:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap510:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap510:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Abhibhū.
ai-tha-ap510:7.1_0: was the eighth Elder Nuns’ Fruit of the World,
